articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Lao President
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of Laos, on the occasion of the 38th anniversary of the founding of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 Kim Jong Un in his message extended warm congratulations to the Lao president and, through him, to the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and the Lao government and people on the occasion.
					
					 The message said that the Korean people are rejoiced over the fact that the government and people of Laos have consolidated and developed their people's democratic system and made achievements in economic construction and the improvement of the people's standard of living and in developing the country's external relations by giving full play to patriotism and the spirit of self-reliance and self-development under the leadership of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party since the founding of the republic and sincerely hope that everything will go well in friendly Laos.
					
					 It expressed the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger as desired and wished by the two peoples, sincerely wishing the Lao president good health and success in his responsible job.

articles.title: Greetings to Central African President
articles.content:
Greetings to Central African President
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Michel Am Nondrok Djotodia, president of the Central African Republic, on the occasion of the  55th anniversary of its proclamation.
					 Kim in the message wished the Central African president and his people greater success in their efforts to promote national unity and restore peace and stability, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop.

articles.title: Greetings to Lao Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Lao Prime Minister
						
Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Thongsing Thammavong, prime minister of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on the occasion of the 38th anniversary of its founding.
					The message noted with pleasure that the government and people of Laos have achieved the social and political stability of the country and successfully carried out the Seventh Five-Year Plan for social economic development under the leadership of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
					
					Expressing the belief that the traditional ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to dynamically develop, it wished the prime minister greater success in his work.
					
					On the same day Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, sent a similar message to Thongloun Sisoulith, vice-prime minister and foreign minister of Laos.

articles.title: Anniversary of Publication of Kim Jong Un's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Publication of Kim Jong Un's Work Observed
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un published his famous work "Our Social Science Should Actively Contribute to Accomplishing the Cause of Modeling Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" on Dec. 1, Juche 101 (2012).
					 The work clarifies that the social science of the DPRK is the one based on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism both in name and in reality, and indicates the tasks and ways to bring about a fresh turning point in the study of social sciences as required by the times and the developing revolution.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says: Kim Jong Un's work is a monumental one as it gives perfect answers to the issues arising in making the social sciences of the DPRK perform its honorable mission and duty as the social sciences based on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					  Modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism serves as a supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea and its eternal banner for victory.
					
					 It is necessary to prepare all members of the society as steadfast Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists and develop all fabrics of the society as required by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and thus turn the country into a world power and a highly civilized and advanced socialist country where all the ideals and wishes of the people become brilliant realities.
					
					 The work serves as an important one clearly indicating the principled requirements for building the Juche-based social sciences, precious guidelines for all fields of social sciences to make a genuine contribution to the building of a thriving nation and a militant banner for decisively increasing the responsibility and role of the social scientists, concludes the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Successfully Implementing Behests of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Successfully Implementing Behests of Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Sunday editorially call for successfully implementing the behests of leader Kim Jong Il to the end, recalling 2 years have elapsed since the Korean people bade farewell to him in profound grief.
					 Rodong Sinmun says all party members, service personnel of the People's Army and people should hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and people and sun of Juche and Songun for all ages, carry out his behests to the end and build a dignified thriving socialist nation on this land without fail.
					
					 His behests serve as important guidelines for revolution and construction and a grand encyclopedia for the life and struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 He clarified in detail the goals to be attained in the building of a thriving nation, tasks facing each field and ways for carrying out them in his lifetime. His behests indicate such precious guidelines as the revolutionary spirit to be fully displayed by our people at present, principled requirements to be consistently met in the revolution and construction including politics and military affairs, economy and culture, and even working spirit and style to be displayed by officials and workers.  
					
					 The drive for building a thriving socialist nation is sure to triumph when his behests are carried out successfully without the slightest deviation.
					
					 We are full of confidence and the building of a thriving nation has a rosy future as we are under tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and there are solid political and military foundation, strong potential of the independent economy which has grown a thousand times stronger along the road of Songun revolution and the single-minded unity more powerful than a nuclear weapon. 
					
					 The implementation of Kim Jong Il's behests provides a sure guarantee for the victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Minju Joson calls on all service personnel and people to brilliantly decorate this significant year by unconditionally and thoroughly carrying out his behests under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Ruling Party's Brigandish Railroading of Motion Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Ruling Party's Railroading of Motion Denounced
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on November 29 denounced the puppet ruling party's typical railroading of a motion.
					 The editorial recalled that a motion calling for approving the appointment of the director of the "Board of Audit and Inspection" was railroaded through the "National Assembly" by abuse of the authority of its speaker on November 28.
					
					 It slammed the "Saenuri Party" for railroading the motion in a typical brigandish and unilateral manner in the absence of lawmakers from opposition parties.
					
					 This action taken by Chongwadae and the "Saenuri Party" in anticipation of strong resistance of opposition parties and media criticism is a tragedy caused by their campaign for eliminating "forces following the north" and enforcing dictatorship, the editorial noted, and  continued:
					
					 In face of the difficulty lying in the way of handling the motion for taking a disciplinary action against a lawmaker from the Unified Progressive Party, "the Saenuri Party" accused the Democratic Party of "protecting the forces following the north."  Recently it is suppressing a religionist after labeling what he said as "remarks following the north."
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime's true colors are brought to light though it is just several months since she came to power. The politics of the present chief executive is, in a word, the one for accusing people of "following the north", concluded the editorial.

articles.title: South Koreans Stage Sit-in Strike in Demand of Proper Rice Price
articles.content:
South Koreans Stage Sit-in Strike in Demand of Proper Rice Price
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Members of the Unified Progressive Party and the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Federation of Women Peasants Associations, the Solidarity for Progress and other civic and social organizations held a press conference outside the "National Assembly" building in Seoul on Nov. 28. They declared an indefinite sit-in strike in demand of proper rice price for peasants. 
					 They accused the "National Assembly" of failing to fix proper rice price despite the demand of peasants.
					
					 They declared they would go on a sit-in strike against the NA in a bid to get proper rice price fixed as it is the lifeline of the peasants.
					
					 Noting that the peasants have been belittled in society, they stressed they would continue their actions till peasants become masters of society and their demand is met.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionist Demands Resignation of Chief Executive
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionist Demands Resignation of Chief Executive
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Pak Chang Sin, elder of the Jonju Parish Priests Group of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice, at a recent interview with the south Korean CBS, urged the chief executive to step down.
					 There is neither law nor justice but exists only violence in south Korea so that its society has been reduced to a terror-ridden one where people's living is plunged into dire destitution and sophism prevails, he deplored, adding:
					
					 What enrages people is the on-going offensive for "eliminating the forces following the north".
					
					 Far from protecting the life of people, the "government" and political camp work only for the specified capitalists while suppressing the struggle of the workers and peasants for their right to existence after branding them as "forces following the north".
					
					 It is an issue of urgent necessity to replace the regime bringing profits to capitalists while killing people.
					
					 The regime change will not take place unless a thorough counter-measure is taken against the alarming illegal case of the last "presidential" election in which the Intelligence Service, military and even the "patriots and veterans affairs agency" interfered.
					
					 Noting Park Geun Hye is not "president" as she took power by rigging the election, he urged her to own all responsibilities and step down of her own accord.

articles.title: Existence of DIT of GSDF Disclosed by Kyodo
articles.content:
Existence of DIT of GSDF Disclosed by Kyodo
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The fact that the unit codenamed DIT, the secret intelligence unit of Japan's Ground "Self-Defence Forces", has existed since the Cold War period, has been disclosed by Kyodo News recently.
					 Kyodo news disclosed on Nov. 27 that the unit has carried out intelligence activities all by itself, quoting the testimonies of a former chief of staff of the Ground SDF and ex-director of the intelligence headquarters of the Defense Ministry of Japan and others.
					
					 According to Kyodo news, the unit has expanded its branches overseas since the start of the Cold War, its main objective was to gather intelligence about the former Soviet Union, China and the DPRK and it is now believed to be active in Russia, south Korea, Poland, etc.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Ruling Forces Assailed by Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Ruling Forces Assailed by Koreans in U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The editor of Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., in an article on November 25 denounced the puppet ruling forces for insulting a fair-minded religionist.
					 The article said:
					
					 Fair-minded father deplored the awful political landscape in south Korea as it is and called for the resignation of Park Geun Hye who came to power through the illegal election in which power organs including the Intelligence Service interfered.
					
					 Upset by this, Park and the "Saenuri Party" kicked off a smear campaign against him through a coloring offensive and reptile media are busy falsifying facts, labeling him "father following the north".
					
					 The above-said ruling forces are brazenfaced ones telling lies only.
					
					 The south Korean society is now in the grip of a crisis due to the ruling forces who cover up their crimes by kicking up a racket for eliminating "forces following the north" and deceive the people with lies and fabrications whenever they open their mouths.
					
					 The ruling forces will not be able to escape a stern judgment by history unless they step down.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Iran 
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Tehran on Nov. 20. 
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran was elected chairman of the committee. 
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from Nov. 20 to Dec. 17 and decided to hold diverse political and cultural events including remembrance meeting, lecture, photo exhibition and film show in the period.

articles.title: Myanmar Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed
articles.content:
Myanmar Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Myanmar Committee for Remembering H.E. Kim Jong Il was formed on November 25. 
					 An official report on the formation of the committee was issued by the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar. 
					
					 Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold various events such as remembrance meeting, round-table talks, film show and photo exhibition for a month from November 25 to join all people of the DPRK and other progressives of the world in commemorating the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia 
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Khabarovsk Territorial Committee for Remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on November 26. 
					 Alexander Fedosov, minister of Culture of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration and chairman of the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee. 
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from November 26 to December 17 and decided to hold various political and cultural events to introduce the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Bulletin "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" Issued in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Bulletin "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" Issued in Bangladesh
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy issued a bulletin titled "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, recognized as a great guiding idea in the era of independence, were formulated as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the bulletin said and went on:
					
					 The formulation marked a historic event of great significance not only for the Korean people but for all the world progressive people struggling for independence,.
					
					 The President, founder of socialist Korea, fathered the Juche idea with deep insight into the requirements of the new era when the popular masses, once oppressed and maltreated, emerged masters of their fate.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed and systemized the Juche idea through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities, making it shine as the great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is an integral system of ideas, theories and methods of Juche and comprehensively indicates revolutionary theories, strategies and tactics in the era of independence.
					
					 The Songun political theory reflecting the requirements of the developing revolution at present and the theory of building a thriving socialist nation occupy an important place in Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed in China, Myanmar
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed in China, Myanmar 
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A Chinese magazine and Myanmar paper devoted special articles to the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The November issue of the Chinese Hong Kong magazine International Link carried several articles illustrated with photos documenting revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 In an article "Eternal Chairman of National Defence Commission" the magazine said Kim Jong Il is the eternal Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC). 
					
					 Kim Jong Il established the state machinery with the NDC as its pivot and provided a legal guarantee for enforcing Songun politics, laying a groundwork for the eternal prosperity of the DPRK, it said. 
					
					 It referred in detail to the fact that Kim Jong Il made sure that new state machinery was set up on the principle of Songun as required by the situation, bringing about a turning phase in building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The November 26 issue of the Myanmar paper The New Age carried an article accompanied with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 It said:
					
					 NDC Chairman Kim Jong Il made sure that the DPRK displayed its might as a military power with invincible military muscle. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il consolidated the political and ideological base of the country as firm as a rock, ushering in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 He firmly equipped the service personnel and people with the Juche idea, Songun idea and encouraged all people to learn from the revolutionary soldier spirit created by the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 In the course of tireless field guidance provided by Kim Jong Il the industrial revolution of the new century started and the potential of the independent industry was given fullest play in the DPRK. 
					
					 The exploits of Kim Jong Il will shine long along with the eternal prosperity of the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Marked in Myanmar
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Marked in Myanmar
						
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar join the members of the Workers' Party of Korea and other Korean people in remembering the brilliant life of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise to the sorrow of all. 
					 An official report of the Myanmar party on November 25 said this at the inaugural ceremony of the Myanmar Committee for Remembering H.E. Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The report said:
					
					 The remembrance committees have been inaugurated in many countries and regions and the Korean people and other progressives of the world hold diverse political and cultural events in humble reverence for Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The Myanmar Committee for Remembering H.E. Kim Jong Il was formally inaugurated. 
					
					 The remembrance committee extends firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their drive for building a thriving nation and achieving the reunification of the country true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and H.E. Kim Jong Il under the leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The great leader H.E. Kim Jong Il is always with us!
